sentence.Network_en: His family tried to assimilate into the white and Hispanic communities.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一家人试图融入白人和西班牙裔社区。

sentence.Network_en: The Vietnamese are trying to assimilate themselves and become Americans.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些越南人正在努力融入美国社会，成为美国人。

sentence.Network_en: The committee will need time to assimilate this report.
sentence.Network_cn: 委员会需要时间来吃透这个报告。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... associate 联合，结合 assimilate 吸收；同化 assure 肯定；确信.
2013考研英语核心词汇_百度文库 ... assign 分配，布置（作业） assimilate 吸收，消化 associate （使）联系， （使）结合.
无论是单细胞的藻类还是高大的树木，都存在体内同化物（assimilate）的运输和分配问题。叶片是同化物的主要制造器官，它合成的同化物不断地运至根、茎、芽、果实和种子中去，用.
英语词汇综合宝典 ... assign v. 指派,指定 assimilate n. (哲学)同化;消化,吸收 assist v. 帮助,援助.

list.abs: assimilation product 同化产物assimilation ratio 同化率assimilation rumber 同化数
genetic 遗传的genetic assimilation 遗传同化genetic balance 遗传平�
assimilation process 同化过程assimilation starch 同化淀粉assimilation substance 同化物
assimilation time 同化时间assimilation tissue 同化组织assimilative pigment 同化色素

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Latin assimilat- 'absorbed, incorporated', from the verb assimilare, from ad- 'to' + similis 'like'

entry.def: When people such as immigrants assimilate into a community or when that community assimilates them, they become an accepted part of it.

example.ex: There is every sign that new Asian-Americans are just as willing to assimilate...
example.tran: 种种迹象表明新一代亚裔美国人也愿意入乡随俗。

example.ex: His family tried to assimilate into the white and Hispanic communities...
example.tran: 他一家人试图融入白人和西班牙裔社区。

entry.def: If you assimilate new ideas, techniques, or information, you learn them or adopt them.

example.ex: I was speechless, still trying to assimilate the enormity of what he'd told me.
example.tran: 我无话可说，一时还无法接受他对我所说之事的严重性。

sentences.sentence: "he absorbed the knowledge or beliefs of his tribe"

means.word_mean: 4. take (gas, light or heat) into a solution

sentences.sentence: "The nasal assimialates to the following consonant"

auth_sentence.content: It took Marx to assimilate and move beyond him.
auth_sentence.res_content: It took Marx to assimilate and move beyond him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It took Marx to assimilate and move beyond him.

auth_sentence.content: There is little attempt to blend in or assimilate.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is little attempt to blend in or assimilate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is little attempt to blend in or assimilate.

auth_sentence.content: Nor does the community seem to be inward-looking or unwilling to assimilate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor does the community seem to be inward-looking or unwilling to assimilate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor does the community seem to be inward-looking or unwilling to assimilate.

stems_affixes.word_buile: simil相类似,一样+ar……的→adj.[to]相似的,类似的
veri=very+similar[adj.[to]相似的,类似的]→非常相似
similar[adj.[to]相似的,类似的]+ly表副词→adv.同样地, 类似于
dis不+simil相类似,一样+ation表名词→不相同
fac事实+simil相类似,一样+e→实际一样→眷写
similar[adj.[to]相似的,类似的]+ity表名词→n.类似,相似;类似点
as不断+simil相同+ate表动词→成为相同→同化

sentences.en: A good student assimilates knowledge quickly.

jushi.english: Some kinds of food assimilate easily.
jushi.chinese: 有些种类的食物容易被吸收。

jushi.english: You have to assimilate the facts, not just remember them.
jushi.chinese: 你要完全了解这些事实,不仅仅是记得这些事实。

jushi.english: A good student assimilates knowledge quickly.
